      • checkObjectLayer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapObjects checkObjectLayer(java.lang.String layerName,
                                                Vector2 point)
        Check if some object overlays some point
        Parameters:
        layerName - name of layer to search for objects on
        point - point which object should contain (in tiles)
        Returns:
        mapobjects that contain given point

      • getTiledObject

        public com.badlogic.gdx.maps.MapObject getTiledObject(java.lang.String layerName,
                                             java.lang.String objectName)
        Get named object from layer. Doesn't correctly work with multiple objects with same name
        Parameters:
        layerName - where to search foer object
        objectName - name of object to find
        Returns:
        object with required name if exist
